short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set Kagi as your default search engine while also preserving your session in private browsing. Remember to enable 'Allow Incognito'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Easily set your default search engine to be Kagi
- Allows Kagi to work in Private Browsing (remember to click 'allow incognito')
- Search-by-image by right-clicking on an image

Kagi Search for Chrome is fully open source. Please review the installation instructions, and if you wish, the source code available at: https://github.com/kagisearch/chrome_extension_basic
